original_text: There was a chamber with its door in the vestibule of the gate, where the burnt offering was to be washed.
korean_text: 그 문 벽 곁에 문이 있는 방이 있는데 그것은 번제물을 씻는 방이며

sentences.original_text: with its door in the vestibule of the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그 문은 문의 현관 안에 있었다

sentences.original_text: where the burnt offering was to be washed
